name: NWProtocolIP
desc: A network protocol for configuring the Internet Protocol on connections.

items.name: class NWProtocolIP.Metadata
items.desc: Per-packet IP metadata you configure when sending and receiving packets.

items.name: class NWProtocolIP.Options
items.desc: A container of options for configuring how IP is used on a connection.

items.name: static let definition: NWProtocolDefinition
items.desc: The system definition of the Internet Protocol.
